data_table.description: Venipuncture Form, VENA, Exam 1. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: VENACY
variable.description: Contact year [1] [Venipuncture Form, VENA, Cohort Visit 1]

variable.name: VENA01
variable.description: [Blood drawing]. Have any bleeding disorders? Q1 [Venipuncture Form, VENA, Cohort Visit 1]

variable.name: VENA04
variable.description: [Blood drawing]. Blood drawn before snack? Q4 [Venipuncture Form, VENA, Cohort Visit 1]

variable.name: VENA05
variable.description: [Blood drawing]. Number of venipuncture attempts. Q5 [Venipuncture Form, VENA, Cohort Visit 1]

variable.name: VENA06
variable.description: [Blood drawing]. Filling time of tube 1 (seconds). Q6 [Venipuncture Form, VENA, Cohort Visit 1]

variable.name: VENA10
variable.description: [Blood processing]. Was specimen visibly hemolyzed? Q10 [Venipuncture Form, VENA, Cohort Visit 1]

variable.name: VENA03HM
variable.description: [Blood drawing]. Time of blood draw [Venipuncture Form, VENA, Cohort Visit 1]

variable.name: VENA08HM
variable.description: [Blood processing]. Time specimen tubes 2,4-7 were spun [Venipuncture Form, VENA, Cohort Visit 1]

variable.name: VENA09HM
variable.description: [Blood processing]. Time specimen tubes 1,3 were spun [Venipuncture Form, VENA, Cohort Visit 1]

variable.name: VENA11HM
variable.description: [Blood processing]. Time Specimen was placed in freezer [Venipuncture Form, VENA, Cohort Visit 1]

variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: ARIC subject ID [Venipuncture Form, VENA, Cohort Visit 1]
